steps.title: Set up
steps.description: Stand ~2-3m from the camera. Wear fitted clothing. Good lighting helps.

steps.title: Set height, weight & gender
steps.description: Enter your exact height, weight and gender.

steps.title: Capture 2 Photos
steps.description: Front and side on a plain background. We'll guide your posture.

steps.title: Confirm
steps.description: Share with your vendor or use in checkout. They can request a recheck if needed.

steps.title: Review & Save
steps.description: See your chart, rename your profile, and share with a vendor only when ready.
